title: My Journey So Far
description: I'm a Charlottesville native raised in a sports-loving, tight-knit family. Iâ€™m driven by a love for learning and the satisfaction of building things from scratch. Outside of work, I enjoy hiking, solving puzzles, and staying active by playing baskeball.
